description:
Danny welcomes former RHONY cast member Heather Thomson to Everything Iconic. They discuss leaving the show, Housewife vacations, working with Beyonce, her new podcast (In My Heart), and lots more!


WATCH THIS INTERVIEW at YouTube.com/DannyPellegrino1


*To support this pod & access bonus episodes, visit Patreon.com/EverythingIconic
